4319            <int>     time_step    1-based index of time step
4320
4321        Returns
4322        -------
4323
4324            if array_type == 'ctype':
4325              <list<ctypes.c_double>>  ssvar_vals
4326
4327            if array_type == 'numpy':
4328              <np_array<double>>  ssvar_vals
4329        """
4330        return self.get_variable_values('EX_SIDE_SET', object_id, name, step)
4331
4332    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4333
4334    def get_partial_side_set_variable_values(self, object_id, name, step, start_index, num_sides):
4335        """
4336        get list of side set variable values for a specified side
4337        set, side set variable name, and time step; the list has
4338        one variable value per side in the set
4339
4340        >>> ssvar_vals = exo.get_side_set_variable_values(side_set_id,
4341        ...    ssvar_name, time_step)
4342
4343        Parameters
4344        ----------
4345            <int>     side_set_id  side set *ID* (not *INDEX*)
4346            <string>  ssvar_name   name of side set variable
4347            <int>     time_step    1-based index of time step
4348            <int>     start_index 1-based index of side to start returning data
4349            <int>     num_nodes   number of sides to return data for.
4350
4351        Returns
4352        -------
4353
4354            if array_type == 'ctype':
4355              <list<ctypes.c_double>>  ssvar_vals
4356
4357            if array_type == 'numpy':
4358              <np_array<double>>  ssvar_vals
4359        """
4360        names = self.get_variable_names('EX_SIDE_SET')
4361        var_id = names.index(name) + 1
4362        values = self.__ex_get_partial_var(step, 'EX_SIDE_SET', var_id, object_id, start_index, num_sides)
4363        if self.use_numpy:
4364            values = ctype_to_numpy(self, values)
4365        return values
4366
4367    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4368
4369    def put_side_set_variable_values(self, object_id, name, step, values):
4370        """
4371        store a list of side set variable values for a specified side
4372        set, side set variable name, and time step; the list has one
4373        variable value per side in the set
4374
4375        >>> status = exo.put_side_set_variable_values(side_set_id,
4376        ...              ssvar_name, time_step, ssvar_vals)
4377
4378        Parameters
4379        ----------
4380            <int>          side_set_id  side set *ID* (not *INDEX*)
4381            <string>       ssvar_name   name of side set variable
4382            <int>          time_step    1-based index of time step
4383            <list<float>>  ssvar_vals
4384
4385        Returns
4386        -------
4387        status : bool
4388            True = successful execution
4389        """
4390        self.put_variable_values('EX_SIDE_SET', object_id, name, step, values)
4391        return True
4392
4393    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4394
4395    def get_side_set_property_names(self):
4396        """
4397        get the list of side set property names for all side sets in
4398        the model
4399
4400        >>> ssprop_names = exo.get_side_set_property_names()
4401
4402        Returns
4403        -------
4404            <list<string>>  ssprop_names
4405        """
4406        names = self.__ex_get_prop_names('EX_SIDE_SET', 'EX_INQ_SS_PROP')
4407        return list(names)
4408
4409    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4410
4411    def get_side_set_property_value(self, object_id, name):
4412        """
4413        get side set property value (an integer) for a specified side
4414        set and side set property name
4415
4416        >>> ssprop_val = exo.get_side_set_property_value(side_set_id, ssprop_name)
4417
4418        Parameters
4419        ----------
4420            <int>     side_set_id  side set *ID* (not *INDEX*)
4421            <string>  ssprop_name
4422
4423        Returns
4424        -------
4425            <int>  ssprop_val
4426        """
4427        propVal = self.__ex_get_prop('EX_SIDE_SET', object_id, name)
4428        return int(propVal)
4429
4430    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4431
4432    def put_side_set_property_value(self, object_id, name, value):
4433        """
4434        store a side set property name and its integer value for a
4435        side set
4436
4437        >>> status = exo.put_side_set_property_value(side_set_id,
4438        ...               ssprop_name, ssprop_val)
4439
4440        Parameters
4441        ----------
4442            <int>     side_set_id  side set *ID* (not *INDEX*)
4443            <string>  ssprop_name
4444            <int>     ssprop_val
4445
4446        Returns
4447        -------
4448        status : bool
4449            True = successful execution
4450        """
4451        return self.__ex_put_prop('EX_SIDE_SET', object_id, name, value)
4452
4453    #
4454    # global variables
4455    #
4456    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4457
4458    def get_global_variable_number(self):
4459        """
4460        get the number of global variables in the model
4461
4462        >>> num_gvars = exo.get_global_variable_number()
4463
4464        Returns
4465        -------
4466              <int>  num_gvars
4467        """
4468        return self.__ex_get_variable_param('EX_GLOBAL').value
4469
4470    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4471
4472    def set_global_variable_number(self, number):
4473        """
4474        update the number of global variables in the model
4475
4476        >>> status = exo.set_global_variable_number(num_gvars)
4477
4478        Parameters
4479        ----------
4480              <int>  num_gvars
4481
4482        Returns
4483        -------
4484        status : bool
4485            True = successful execution
4486        """
4487        self.__ex_put_variable_param('EX_GLOBAL', number)
4488        return True
4489
4490    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4491
4492    def get_global_variable_names(self):
4493        """
4494        get the list of global variable names in the model
4495
4496        >>> gvar_names = exo.get_global_variable_names()
4497
4498        Returns
4499        -------
4500              <list<string>>  gvar_names
4501        """
4502        if self.get_variable_number('EX_GLOBAL') == 0:
4503            return []
4504        return self.__ex_get_variable_names('EX_GLOBAL')
4505
4506    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4507
4508    def put_global_variable_name(self, name, index):
4509        """
4510        add the name and index of a new global variable to the model;
4511        global variable indexing goes from 1 to
4512        exo.get_global_variable_number()
4513
4514        >>> status = exo.put_global_variable_name(gvar_name, gvar_index)
4515
4516        Parameters
4517        ----------
4518            <string>  gvar_name   name of new global variable
4519            <int>     gvar_index  1-based index of new global variable
4520
4521        Returns
4522        -------
4523        status : bool
4524            True = successful execution
4525
4526        Note:
4527        -----
4528        this method is often called within the following sequence:
4529
4530        >>> num_gvars = exo.get_global_variable_number()
4531        >>> new_gvar_index = num_gvars + 1
4532        >>> num_gvars += 1
4533        >>> exo.set_global_variable_number(num_gvars)
4534        >>> exo.put_global_variable_name("new_gvar", new_gvar_index)
4535        """
4536        GlobVarNames = self.get_variable_names('EX_GLOBAL')
4537        if name in GlobVarNames:
4538            print(f'WARNING: Global variable \"{name}\" already exists.')
4539        if index > len(GlobVarNames):
4540            print(("index", index, "len", len(GlobVarNames)))
4541            raise Exception("ERROR: variable index out of range.")
4542        self.__ex_put_variable_name('EX_GLOBAL', index, name)
4543        return True
4544
4545    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4546
4547    def get_global_variable_value(self, name, step):
4548        """
4549        get a global variable value for a specified global variable
4550        name and time step
4551
4552        >>> gvar_val = exo.get_global_variable_value(gvar_name, time_step)
4553
4554        Parameters
4555        ----------
4556            <string>  gvar_name  name of global variable
4557            <int>     time_step  1-based index of time step
4558
4559        Returns
4560        -------
4561            <float>  gvar_val
4562        """
4563        names = self.get_variable_names('EX_GLOBAL')
4564        var_id = names.index(name)
4565        num = self.__ex_get_variable_param('EX_GLOBAL')
4566        gvalues = self.__ex_get_var(step, 'EX_GLOBAL', 0, 1, num.value)
4567        return gvalues[var_id]
4568
4569    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4570
4571    def get_all_global_variable_values(self, step):
4572        """
4573        get all global variable values (one for each global variable
4574        name, and in the order given by exo.get_global_variable_names())
4575        at a specified time step
4576
4577        >>> gvar_vals = exo.get_all_global_variable_values(time_step)
4578
4579        Parameters
4580        ----------
4581            <int>     time_step  1-based index of time step
4582
4583        Returns
4584        -------
4585
4586            if array_type == 'ctype':
4587              <list<float>>  gvar_vals
4588
4589            if array_type == 'numpy':
4590              <np_array<double>>  gvar_vals
4591        """
4592        num = self.__ex_get_variable_param('EX_GLOBAL')
4593        gvalues = self.__ex_get_var(step, 'EX_GLOBAL', 0, 1, num.value)
4594        values = [gvalues[i] for i in range(num.value)]
4595        if self.use_numpy:
4596            values = self.np.array(values)
4597        return values
4598
4599    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4600
4601    def put_global_variable_value(self, name, step, value):
4602        """
4603        store a global variable value for a specified global variable
4604        name and time step
4605
4606        >>> status = exo.put_global_variable_value(gvar_name, time_step, gvar_val)
4607
4608        Parameters
4609        ----------
4610            <string>  gvar_name  name of global variable
4611            <int>     time_step  1-based index of time step
4612            <float>   gvar_val
4613
4614        Returns
4615        -------
4616        status : bool
4617            True = successful execution
4618        """
4619        # we must write all values at once, not individually
4620        names = self.get_variable_names('EX_GLOBAL')
4621        # get all values
4622        numVals = self.get_variable_number('EX_GLOBAL')
4623        values = (ctypes.c_double * numVals)()
4624        for i in range(numVals):
4625            values[i] = ctypes.c_double(
4626                self.get_global_variable_value(
4627                    names[i], step))
4628        # adjust one of them
4629        values[names.index(name)] = ctypes.c_double(value)
4630        # write them all
4631        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_var(self.fileId,
4632                              ctypes.c_int(step),
4633                              ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_GLOBAL')),
4634                              ctypes.c_int(1),
4635                              ctypes.c_int(0),
4636                              ctypes.c_int(numVals),
4637                              values)
4638        return True
4639
4640    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4641
4642    def put_all_global_variable_values(self, step, values):
4643        """
4644        store all global variable values (one for each global variable
4645        name, and in the order given by exo.get_global_variable_names())
4646        at a specified time step
4647
4648        >>> status = exo.put_all_global_variable_values(time_step, gvar_vals)
4649
4650        Parameters
4651        ----------
4652            <int>          time_step  1-based index of time step
4653            <list<float>>  gvar_vals
4654
4655        Returns
4656        -------
4657        status : bool
4658            True = successful execution
4659        """
4660        numVals = self.get_variable_number('EX_GLOBAL')
4661        gvalues = (ctypes.c_double * numVals)()
4662        for i in range(numVals):
4663            gvalues[i] = ctypes.c_double(values[i])
4664        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_var(self.fileId,
4665                              ctypes.c_int(step),
4666                              ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_GLOBAL')),
4667                              ctypes.c_int(1),
4668                              ctypes.c_int(0),
4669                              ctypes.c_int(numVals),
4670                              gvalues)
4671        return True
4672
4673    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4674
4675    def get_global_variable_values(self, name):
4676        """
4677        get global variable values over all time steps for one global
4678        variable name
4679
4680        >>> gvar_vals = exo.get_global_variable_values(gvar_name)
4681
4682        Parameters
4683        ----------
4684            <string>  gvar_name  name of global variable
4685
4686        Returns
4687        -------
4688
4689            if array_type == 'ctype':
4690              <list<float>>  gvar_vals
4691
4692            if array_type == 'numpy':
4693              <np_array<double>>  gvar_vals
4694        """
4695        names = self.get_variable_names('EX_GLOBAL')
4696        var_id = names.index(name)
4697        num = self.__ex_get_variable_param('EX_GLOBAL')
4698        values = []
4699        for i in range(self.numTimes.value):
4700            gvalues = self.__ex_get_var(i + 1, 'EX_GLOBAL', 0, 1, num.value)
4701            values.append(gvalues[var_id])
4702        if self.use_numpy:
4703            values = self.np.array(values)
4704        return values
4705
4706    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4707
4708    def put_polyhedra_elem_blk(self, blkID,
4709                               num_elems_this_blk,
4710                               num_faces,
4711                               num_attr_per_elem):
4712        """
4713        put in an element block with polyhedral elements
4714
4715        >>> status = exo.put_polyhedra_elem_blk(blkID, num_elems_this_blk,
4716        ...                                     num_faces, num_attr_per_elem)
4717
4718        Parameters
4719        ----------
4720            <int>     blkID               id of the block to be added
4721            <int>     num_elems_this_blk
4722            <int>     num_faces  total number of faces in this block
4723            <int>     num_attr_per_elem
4724
4725        Returns
4726        -------
4727        status : bool
4728            True = successful execution
4729        """
4730
4731        ebType = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK'))
4732        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_block(self.fileId, ebType, ctypes.c_longlong(blkID),
4733                                ctypes.create_string_buffer(b"NFACED"),
4734                                ctypes.c_longlong(num_elems_this_blk),
4735                                ctypes.c_longlong(0),
4736                                ctypes.c_longlong(0),
4737                                ctypes.c_longlong(num_faces),
4738                                ctypes.c_longlong(num_attr_per_elem))
4739        return True
4740
4741    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4742
4743    def put_polyhedra_face_blk(self, blkID,
4744                               num_faces_this_blk,
4745                               num_nodes,
4746                               num_attr_per_face):
4747        """
4748        put in a block of faces
4749
4750        >>> status = exo.put_polyhedra_face_blk(blkID, num_faces_this_blk,
4751        ...                                     num_nodes, num_attr_per_face)
4752
4753        Parameters
4754        ----------
4755            <int>     blkID               id of the block to be added
4756            <int>     num_faces_this_blk
4757            <int>     num_nodes           total number of nodes in this block
4758            <int>     num_attr_per_face
4759
4760        Returns
4761        -------
4762        status : bool
4763            True = successful execution
4764        """
4765        fbType = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_FACE_BLOCK'))
4766        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_block(self.fileId, fbType, ctypes.c_longlong(blkID),
4767                                ctypes.create_string_buffer(b"NSIDED"),
4768                                ctypes.c_longlong(num_faces_this_blk),
4769                                ctypes.c_longlong(num_nodes),
4770                                ctypes.c_longlong(0),
4771                                ctypes.c_longlong(0),
4772                                ctypes.c_longlong(num_attr_per_face))
4773        return True
4774
4775    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4776
4777    def put_face_count_per_polyhedra(self, blkID, entityCounts):
4778        """
4779        put in a count of faces in for each polyhedra in an elem block
4780
4781        >>> status = exo.put_face_count_per_polyhedra(blkID, entityCounts)
4782
4783        Parameters
4784        ----------
4785            <int>     blkID               id of the block to be added
4786
4787            if array_type == 'ctype':
4788              <list<float>>  entityCounts
4789
4790            if array_type == 'numpy':
4791              <np_array<double>>  entityCounts
4792
4793        Returns
4794        -------
4795        status : bool
4796            True = successful execution
4797        """
4798        ebType = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK'))
4799        entity_counts = (ctypes.c_int * len(entityCounts))()
4800        entity_counts[:] = entityCounts
4801        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_entity_count_per_polyhedra(
4802            self.fileId, ebType, ctypes.c_longlong(blkID), entity_counts)
4803        return True
4804
4805    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4806
4807    def put_node_count_per_face(self, blkID, entityCounts):
4808        """
4809        put in a count of nodes in for each face in a polygonal face block
4810
4811        >>> status = exo.put_node_count_per_face(blkID, entityCounts)
4812
4813        Parameters
4814        ----------
4815            <int>     blkID               id of the block to be added
4816
4817            if array_type == 'ctype':
4818              <list<float>>  entityCounts
4819
4820            if array_type == 'numpy':
4821              <np_array<double>>  entityCounts
4822
4823        Returns
4824        -------
4825        status : bool
4826            True = successful execution
4827        """
4828        ebType = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_FACE_BLOCK'))
4829        entity_counts = (ctypes.c_int * len(entityCounts))()
4830        entity_counts[:] = entityCounts
4831        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_entity_count_per_polyhedra(
4832            self.fileId, ebType, ctypes.c_longlong(blkID), entity_counts)
4833        return True
4834
4835    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4836
4837    def put_elem_face_conn(self, blkId, elemFaceConn):
4838        """
4839        put in connectivity information from elems to faces
4840
4841        >>> status = exo.put_elem_face_conn(blkID, elemFaceConn)
4842
4843        Parameters
4844        ----------
4845            <int>     blkID               id of the elem block to be added
4846
4847            if array_type == 'ctype':
4848              <list<float>>  elemFaceConn  (raveled/flat list)
4849
4850            if array_type == 'numpy':
4851              <np_array<double>>  elemFaceConn  (raveled/flat array)
4852
4853        Returns
4854        -------
4855        status : bool
4856            True = successful execution
4857        """
4858        ebType = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK'))
4859        elem_face_conn = (ctypes.c_int * len(elemFaceConn))()
4860        elem_face_conn[:] = elemFaceConn
4861        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_conn(self.fileId, ebType, ctypes.c_longlong(blkId),
4862                               None, None, elem_face_conn)
4863        return True
4864
4865    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4866
4867    def put_face_node_conn(self, blkId, faceNodeConn):
4868        """
4869        put in connectivity information from faces to nodes
4870
4871        >>> status = exo.put_face_node_conn(blkID, faceNodeConn)
4872
4873        Parameters
4874        ----------
4875            <int>     blkID               id of the face block to be added
4876
4877            if array_type == 'ctype':
4878              <list<float>>  faceNodeConn  (raveled/flat list)
4879
4880            if array_type == 'numpy':
4881              <np_array<double>>  faceNodeConn  (raveled/flat array)
4882
4883        Returns
4884        -------
4885        status : bool
4886            True = successful execution
4887        """
4888        ebType = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_FACE_BLOCK'))
4889        node_conn = (ctypes.c_int * len(faceNodeConn))()
4890        node_conn[:] = faceNodeConn
4891        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_conn(self.fileId, ebType, ctypes.c_longlong(blkId),
4892                               node_conn, None, None)
4893        return True
4894
4895    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4896
4897    def close(self):
4898        """
4899        close the exodus file
4900
4901        >>> exo.close()
4902
4903        Note:
4904        -----
4905        Can only be called once for an exodus object, and once called
4906        all methods for that object become inoperable
4907        """
4908        print(f"Closing exodus file: {self.fileName}")
4909        errorInt = EXODUS_LIB.ex_close(self.fileId)
4910        if errorInt != 0:
4911            raise Exception(
4912                "ERROR: Closing file " + self.fileName + " had problems.")
4913
4914    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4915    #
4916    # Private Exodus API calls
4917    #
4918    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4919
4920    def __open(self, io_size=0):
4921        print(f"Opening exodus file: {self.fileName}")
4922        self.mode = EX_READ
4923        if self.modeChar.lower() == "a":
4924            self.mode = EX_WRITE
4925        if self.modeChar.lower() == "w+":
4926            self.mode = EX_CLOBBER
4927
4928        if self.modeChar.lower() in [
4929                "a", "r"] and not os.path.isfile(self.fileName):
4930            raise Exception(
4931                "ERROR: Cannot open " + self.fileName + " for read. Does not exist.")
4932        elif self.modeChar.lower() == "w" and os.path.isfile(self.fileName):
4933            raise Exception(f"ERROR: Cowardly not opening {self.fileName} for write. File already exists.")
4934
4935        elif self.modeChar.lower() not in ["a", "r", "w", "w+"]:
4936            raise Exception(
4937                "ERROR: File open mode " + self.modeChar + " unrecognized.")
4938
4939        self.comp_ws = ctypes.c_int(8)
4940        self.io_ws = ctypes.c_int(io_size)
4941        self.version = ctypes.c_float(0.0)
4942        if self.modeChar.lower() in ["a", "r"]:  # open existing file
4943            self.fileId = EXODUS_LIB.ex_open_int(self.fileName.encode('ascii'), self.mode,
4944                                                 ctypes.byref(self.comp_ws),
4945                                                 ctypes.byref(self.io_ws),
4946                                                 ctypes.byref(self.version),
4947                                                 EX_API_VERSION_NODOT)
4948        else:  # create file
4949            if io_size == 0:
4950                io_size = 8
4951                self.io_ws = ctypes.c_int(io_size)
4952            self.__create()
4953
4954    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4955
4956    def __create(self):
4957        self.fileId = EXODUS_LIB.ex_create_int(self.fileName.encode('ascii'), self.mode,
4958                                               ctypes.byref(self.comp_ws),
4959                                               ctypes.byref(self.io_ws),
4960                                               EX_API_VERSION_NODOT)
4961
4962    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4963
4964    def __ex_get_info(self):
4965        self.Title = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1)
4966        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
4967            self.numDim = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4968            self.numNodes = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4969            self.numElem = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4970            self.numElemBlk = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4971            self.numNodeSets = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4972            self.numSideSets = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4973            self.numAssembly = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4974            self.numBlob = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
4975        else:
4976            self.numDim = ctypes.c_int(0)
4977            self.numNodes = ctypes.c_int(0)
4978            self.numElem = ctypes.c_int(0)
4979            self.numElemBlk = ctypes.c_int(0)
4980            self.numNodeSets = ctypes.c_int(0)
4981            self.numSideSets = ctypes.c_int(0)
4982            self.numAssembly = ctypes.c_int(0)
4983            self.numBlob = ctypes.c_int(0)
4984        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_init(
4985            self.fileId, self.Title,
4986            ctypes.byref(self.numDim),
4987            ctypes.byref(self.numNodes),
4988            ctypes.byref(self.numElem),
4989            ctypes.byref(self.numElemBlk),
4990            ctypes.byref(self.numNodeSets),
4991            ctypes.byref(self.numSideSets))
4992
4993    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
4994
4995    def __ex_put_info(self, info):
4996        self.Title = ctypes.create_string_buffer(info[0].encode('ascii'), MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1)
4997        self.numDim = ctypes.c_longlong(info[1])
4998        self.numNodes = ctypes.c_longlong(info[2])
4999        self.numElem = ctypes.c_longlong(info[3])
5000        self.numElemBlk = ctypes.c_longlong(info[4])
5001        self.numNodeSets = ctypes.c_longlong(info[5])
5002        self.numSideSets = ctypes.c_longlong(info[6])
5003        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_init(
5004            self.fileId,
5005            self.Title,
5006            self.numDim,
5007            self.numNodes,
5008            self.numElem,
5009            self.numElemBlk,
5010            self.numNodeSets,
5011            self.numSideSets)
5012        self.version = self.__ex_inquire_float(ex_inquiry_map('EX_INQ_DB_VERS'))
5013
5014    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5015
5016    def __ex_put_concat_elem_blk(self, elemBlkIDs, elemType, numElemThisBlk,
5017                                 numNodesPerElem, numAttr, defineMaps):
5018        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5019            elem_blk_ids = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5020            elem_blk_ids[:] = elemBlkIDs
5021            num_elem_this_blk = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5022            num_elem_this_blk[:] = numElemThisBlk
5023            num_nodes_per_elem = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5024            num_nodes_per_elem[:] = numNodesPerElem
5025            num_attr = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5026        else:
5027            elem_blk_ids = (ctypes.c_int * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5028            elem_blk_ids[:] = elemBlkIDs
5029            num_elem_this_blk = (ctypes.c_int * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5030            num_elem_this_blk[:] = numElemThisBlk
5031            num_nodes_per_elem = (ctypes.c_int * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5032            num_nodes_per_elem[:] = numNodesPerElem
5033            num_attr = (ctypes.c_int * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5034        num_attr[:] = numAttr
5035        elem_type = (ctypes.c_char_p * len(elemBlkIDs))()
5036        elem_type[:] = elemType
5037        define_maps = ctypes.c_int(defineMaps)
5038        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_concat_elem_block(
5039            self.fileId,
5040            elem_blk_ids,
5041            elem_type,
5042            num_elem_this_blk,
5043            num_nodes_per_elem,
5044            num_attr,
5045            define_maps)
5046
5047    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5048
5049    def __ex_get_qa(self):
5050        num_qa_recs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(ex_inquiry_map('EX_INQ_QA')))
5051        qa_rec_ptrs = ((ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1)) * 4) * num_qa_recs.value)()
5052        for i in range(num_qa_recs.value):
5053            for j in range(4):
5054                qa_rec_ptrs[i][j] = ctypes.pointer(
5055                    ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1))
5056        if num_qa_recs.value:
5057            EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_qa(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(qa_rec_ptrs))
5058        qa_recs = []
5059        for qara in qa_rec_ptrs:
5060            qa_rec_list = [ptr.contents.value.decode("utf8") for ptr in qara]
5061            qa_rec_tuple = tuple(qa_rec_list)
5062            assert len(qa_rec_tuple) == 4
5063            qa_recs.append(qa_rec_tuple)
5064        return qa_recs
5065
5066    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5067
5068    def __ex_put_qa(self, qaRecs):
5069        num_qa_recs = ctypes.c_int(len(qaRecs))
5070        qa_rec_ptrs = ((ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1)) * 4) * num_qa_recs.value)()
5071        for i in range(num_qa_recs.value):
5072            for j in range(4):
5073                qa_rec_ptrs[i][j] = ctypes.pointer(ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5074                    str(qaRecs[i][j]).encode('ascii'), MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1))
5075        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_qa(self.fileId, num_qa_recs, ctypes.byref(qa_rec_ptrs))
5076        return True
5077
5078    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5079
5080    def _ex_get_info_recs_quietly(self):
5081        num_infos = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(ex_inquiry_map('EX_INQ_INFO')))
5082        info_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1)) * num_infos.value)()
5083        for i in range(num_infos.value):
5084            info_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1))
5085        if num_infos.value:
5086            EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_info(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(info_ptrs))
5087        return [irp.contents.value.decode("utf8") for irp in info_ptrs]
5088
5089    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5090
5091    def __ex_get_info_recs(self):
5092        num_infos = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(ex_inquiry_map('EX_INQ_INFO')))
5093        info_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1)) * num_infos.value)()
5094        for i in range(num_infos.value):
5095            info_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1))
5096        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_info(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(info_ptrs))
5097        info_recs = [irp.contents.value.decode("utf8") for irp in info_ptrs]
5098        for rec in info_recs:
5099            if len(rec) > MAX_LINE_LENGTH:
5100                print("WARNING: max line length reached for one or more info records;")
5101                print("         info might be incomplete for these records")
5102                break
5103        return info_recs
5104
5105    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5106
5107    def __ex_put_info_recs(self, infoRecs):
5108        num_infos = ctypes.c_int(len(infoRecs))
5109        info_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1)) * num_infos.value)()
5110        for i in range(num_infos.value):
5111            info_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5112                str(infoRecs[i]).encode('ascii'), MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1))
5113        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_info(self.fileId, num_infos, ctypes.byref(info_ptrs))
5114        return True
5115
5116    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5117
5118    def __ex_inquire_float(self, inq_id):
5119        dummy_char = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_LINE_LENGTH + 1)
5120        ret_float = ctypes.c_float(0.0)
5121        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_INQ_INT64_API:
5122            dummy_int = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5123        else:
5124            dummy_int = ctypes.c_int(0)
5125        val = EXODUS_LIB.ex_inquire(
5126            self.fileId,
5127            inq_id,
5128            ctypes.byref(dummy_int),
5129            ctypes.byref(ret_float),
5130            dummy_char)
5131        if val < 0:
5132            raise Exception(
5133                "ERROR: ex_inquire(" + str(inq_id) + ") failed on " + self.fileName)
5134        return ret_float
5135
5136    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5137
5138    def __ex_inquire_int(self, inq_id):
5139        val = EXODUS_LIB.ex_inquire_int(self.fileId, inq_id)
5140        if val < 0:
5141            raise Exception(
5142                "ERROR: ex_inquire_int(" + str(inq_id) + ") failed on " + self.fileName)
5143        return val
5144
5145    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5146
5147    def __ex_get_coord_names(self):
5148        coord_name_ptrs = (
5149            ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)) * self.numDim.value)()
5150        for i in range(self.numDim.value):
5151            coord_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
5152                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5153                    MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1))
5154        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_coord_names(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(coord_name_ptrs))
5155        return [cnp.contents.value.decode('utf8') for cnp in coord_name_ptrs]
5156
5157    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5158
5159    def __ex_put_coord_names(self, names):
5160        coord_name_ptrs = (
5161            ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)) * self.numDim.value)()
5162        assert len(names) == self.numDim.value
5163        for i in range(self.numDim.value):
5164            coord_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
5165                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5166                    names[i].encode('ascii'), MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1))
5167        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_coord_names(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(coord_name_ptrs))
5168
5169    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5170
5171    def __ex_get_all_times(self):
5172        self.times = (ctypes.c_double * self.numTimes.value)()
5173        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_all_times(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(self.times))
5174
5175    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5176
5177    def __ex_get_time(self, timeStep):
5178        time_step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5179        time_val = ctypes.c_double(0.0)
5180        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_time(self.fileId, time_step, ctypes.byref(time_val))
5181        return time_val.value()
5182
5183    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5184
5185    def __ex_put_time(self, timeStep, timeVal):
5186        time_step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5187        time_val = ctypes.c_double(timeVal)
5188        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_time(self.fileId, time_step, ctypes.byref(time_val))
5189        return True
5190
5191    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5192
5193    def __ex_get_name(self, objType, objId):
5194        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5195        obj_id = ctypes.c_longlong(objId)
5196        obj_name = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5197        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_name(self.fileId, obj_type, obj_id, ctypes.byref(obj_name))
5198        return obj_name.value.decode('utf8')
5199
5200    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5201
5202    def __ex_put_name(self, objType, objId, objName):
5203        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5204        obj_id = ctypes.c_longlong(objId)
5205        obj_name = ctypes.create_string_buffer(objName.encode('ascii'), MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5206        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_name(self.fileId, obj_type, obj_id, obj_name)
5207
5208    # --------------------------------------------------------------------
5209
5210    def __ex_get_names(self, objType):
5211        inqType = ex_inquiry_map(ex_obj_to_inq(objType))
5212        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inqType)).value
5213        obj_name_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)) * num_objs)()
5214        for i in range(num_objs):
5215            obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5216            obj_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
5217                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5218                    MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1))
5219
5220        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_names(self.fileId, obj_type, ctypes.byref(obj_name_ptrs))
5221        return [onp.contents.value.decode('utf8') for onp in obj_name_ptrs]
5222
5223    def __ex_put_names(self, objType, objNames):
5224        inqType = ex_inquiry_map(ex_obj_to_inq(objType))
5225        numObjs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inqType)).value
5226        assert numObjs == len(objNames)
5227        obj_name_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)) * numObjs)()
5228        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5229        for i in range(numObjs):
5230            obj_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
5231                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5232                    objNames[i].encode('ascii'), MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1))
5233        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_names(self.fileId, obj_type, ctypes.byref(obj_name_ptrs))
5234
5235    def __ex_get_ids(self, objType):
5236        inqType = ex_inquiry_map(ex_obj_to_inq(objType))
5237        numObjs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inqType)).value
5238        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5239            ids = (ctypes.c_longlong * numObjs)()
5240        else:
5241            ids = (ctypes.c_int * numObjs)()
5242        if numObjs > 0:
5243            obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5244            EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_ids(self.fileId, obj_type, ctypes.byref(ids))
5245        return ids
5246
5247    def __ex_get_assembly(self, assem_struct):
5248        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_assembly(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(assem_struct))
5249        ptr = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5250        assem_struct.name = ctypes.cast(ptr, ctypes.c_char_p)
5251        eptr = (ctypes.c_longlong * assem_struct.entity_count)()
5252        assem_struct.entity_list = eptr
5253        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_assembly(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(assem_struct))
5254
5255    def __ex_get_assemblies(self, assem_list):
5256        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_assemblies(self.fileId, assem_list)
5257        for assem_struct in assem_list:
5258            ptr = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5259            assem_struct.name = ctypes.cast(ptr, ctypes.c_char_p)
5260            eptr = (ctypes.c_longlong * assem_struct.entity_count)()
5261            assem_struct.entity_list = eptr
5262        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_assemblies(self.fileId, assem_list)
5263
5264    def __ex_get_blob(self, blob_struct):
5265        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_blob(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(blob_struct))
5266        ptr = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5267        blob_struct.name = ctypes.cast(ptr, ctypes.c_char_p)
5268        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_blob(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(blob_struct))
5269
5270    def __ex_put_assembly(self, assembly):
5271        assem = setup_ex_assembly(assembly)
5272        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_assembly(self.fileId, assem)
5273
5274    def __ex_put_assemblies(self, assemblies):
5275        assembly_list = []
5276        for assembly in assemblies:
5277            assem = setup_ex_assembly(assembly)
5278            assembly_list.append(assem)
5279        assems = (ex_assembly * len(assemblies))(*assembly_list)
5280
5281        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_assemblies(self.fileId, len(assembly_list), assems)
5282
5283    def __ex_get_attribute_count(self, objType, objId):
5284        # Get attribute count...
5285        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5286        obj_id = ctypes.c_longlong(objId)
5287        return EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_attribute_count(self.fileId, obj_type, obj_id)
5288
5289    def __ex_get_attributes(self, objType, objId):
5290        # Get attribute count...
5291        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5292        obj_id = ctypes.c_longlong(objId)
5293        att_count = EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_attribute_count(self.fileId, obj_type, obj_id)
5294
5295        attributes = {}
5296        if att_count > 0:
5297            att = (ex_attribute * att_count)()
5298            EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_attribute_param(self.fileId, obj_type, obj_id, ctypes.byref(att))
5299            for i in range(att_count):
5300                EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_attribute(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(att[i]))
5301                tmp_att = attribute(att[i].name.decode('utf8'), att[i].entity_type, att[i].entity_id)
5302
5303                if (att[i].type == 2):
5304                    vals = ctypes.cast(att[i].values, ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char))
5305                    tmp = [vals[j] for j in range(att[i].value_count - 1)]
5306                    tmp_att.values = b''.join(tmp).decode('utf8')
5307
5308                if (att[i].type == 4):
5309                    vals = ctypes.cast(att[i].values, ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_int))
5310                    for j in range(att[i].value_count):
5311                        tmp_att.values.append(vals[j])
5312
5313                if (att[i].type == 6):
5314                    vals = ctypes.cast(att[i].values, ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_double))
5315                    for j in range(att[i].value_count):
5316                        tmp_att.values.append(vals[j])
5317
5318                attributes[att[i].name.decode('utf8')] = tmp_att
5319
5320        return attributes
5321
5322    def __ex_put_attribute(self, attribute):
5323        att_id = ctypes.c_longlong(attribute.entity_id)
5324        att = ex_attribute(entity_id=att_id)
5325        att.name = attribute.name.encode('ascii')
5326        att.entity_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(attribute.entity_type))
5327        att.value_count = len(attribute.values)
5328
5329        if (isinstance(attribute.values[0], int)):
5330            eptr = (ctypes.c_int * len(attribute.values))()
5331            for i in range(len(attribute.values)):
5332                eptr[i] = ctypes.c_int(attribute.values[i])
5333            att.values = ctypes.cast(eptr, ctypes.c_void_p)
5334            att.type = 4
5335
5336        elif (isinstance(attribute.values[0], float)):
5337            eptr = (ctypes.c_double * len(attribute.values))()
5338            for i in range(len(attribute.values)):
5339                eptr[i] = ctypes.c_double(attribute.values[i])
5340            att.values = ctypes.cast(eptr, ctypes.c_void_p)
5341            att.type = 6
5342
5343        elif (isinstance(attribute.values[0], str)):
5344            eptr = (ctypes.c_char * (len(attribute.values) + 1))()
5345            eptr = attribute.values[0].encode('ascii')
5346            att.values = ctypes.cast(eptr, ctypes.c_void_p)
5347            att.type = 2
5348
5349        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_attribute(self.fileId, att)
5350
5351    def __ex_get_node_set(self, nodeSetId):
5352        node_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(nodeSetId)
5353        num_node_set_nodes = self.__ex_get_set_param('EX_NODE_SET', nodeSetId)[0]
5354        if num_node_set_nodes == 0:
5355            return []
5356        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5357            set_nodes = (ctypes.c_longlong * num_node_set_nodes)()
5358        else:
5359            set_nodes = (ctypes.c_int * num_node_set_nodes)()
5360        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_set(self.fileId, ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_NODE_SET')), node_set_id, ctypes.byref(set_nodes), None)
5361        return set_nodes
5362
5363    def __ex_put_node_set(self, nodeSetId, nodeSetNodes):
5364        node_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(nodeSetId)
5365        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5366            node_set_nodes = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(nodeSetNodes))()
5367            for i, node_set_node in enumerate(nodeSetNodes):
5368                node_set_nodes[i] = ctypes.c_longlong(node_set_node)
5369        else:
5370            node_set_nodes = (ctypes.c_int * len(nodeSetNodes))()
5371            for i, node_set_node in enumerate(nodeSetNodes):
5372                node_set_nodes[i] = ctypes.c_int(node_set_node)
5373        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_set(self.fileId, ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_NODE_SET')), node_set_id, node_set_nodes, None)
5374
5375    def __ex_get_node_set_dist_fact(self, nodeSetId):
5376        node_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(nodeSetId)
5377        num_node_set_nodes = self.__ex_get_set_param('EX_NODE_SET', nodeSetId)[0]
5378        set_dfs = (ctypes.c_double * num_node_set_nodes)()
5379        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_node_set_dist_fact(
5380            self.fileId, node_set_id, ctypes.byref(set_dfs))
5381        return set_dfs
5382
5383    def __ex_put_node_set_dist_fact(self, nodeSetId, nodeSetDistFact):
5384        node_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(nodeSetId)
5385        node_set_dist_fact = (ctypes.c_double * len(nodeSetDistFact))()
5386        for i, dist_fact in enumerate(nodeSetDistFact):
5387            node_set_dist_fact[i] = ctypes.c_double(dist_fact)
5388        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_node_set_dist_fact(
5389            self.fileId, node_set_id, node_set_dist_fact)
5390
5391    def __ex_get_object_truth_vector(self, objType, entId):
5392        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5393        entity_id = ctypes.c_longlong(entId)
5394        variable_count = self.__ex_get_variable_param(objType)
5395        truth_table = (ctypes.c_int * (variable_count.value))()
5396
5397        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_object_truth_vector(self.fileId, obj_type,
5398                                              entity_id, variable_count,
5399                                              ctypes.byref(truth_table))
5400        truthTab = []
5401        for val in truth_table:
5402            if val:
5403                truthTab.append(True)
5404            else:
5405                truthTab.append(False)
5406        return truthTab
5407
5408    def __ex_get_truth_table(self, objType):
5409        inqType = ex_inquiry_map(ex_obj_to_inq(objType))
5410        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inqType)).value
5411
5412        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5413        variable_count = self.__ex_get_variable_param(objType)
5414
5415        truth_table = (ctypes.c_int * (num_objs * variable_count.value))()
5416        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_truth_table(self.fileId, obj_type,
5417                                      num_objs, variable_count,
5418                                      ctypes.byref(truth_table))
5419        truthTab = []
5420        for val in truth_table:
5421            if val:
5422                truthTab.append(True)
5423            else:
5424                truthTab.append(False)
5425        return truthTab
5426
5427    def __ex_put_truth_table(self, objType, truthTab):
5428        inqType = ex_inquiry_map(ex_obj_to_inq(objType))
5429        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inqType)).value
5430
5431        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5432        num_vars = self.__ex_get_variable_param(objType).value
5433
5434        assert len(truthTab) == (num_objs * num_vars)
5435
5436        truth_tab = (ctypes.c_int * (num_objs * num_vars))()
5437        for i, boolVal in enumerate(truthTab):
5438            truth_tab[i] = ctypes.c_int(1) if boolVal else ctypes.c_int(0)
5439        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_truth_table(
5440            self.fileId, obj_type, num_objs, num_vars, truth_tab)
5441        return True
5442
5443    def __ex_get_coord(self):
5444        self.coordsX = (ctypes.c_double * self.numNodes.value)()
5445        self.coordsY = (ctypes.c_double * self.numNodes.value)()
5446        self.coordsZ = (ctypes.c_double * self.numNodes.value)()
5447        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_coord(
5448            self.fileId,
5449            ctypes.byref(self.coordsX),
5450            ctypes.byref(self.coordsY),
5451            ctypes.byref(self.coordsZ))
5452
5453    def __ex_put_coord(self, xCoords, yCoords, zCoords):
5454        self.coordsX = (ctypes.c_double * self.numNodes.value)()
5455        self.coordsY = (ctypes.c_double * self.numNodes.value)()
5456        self.coordsZ = (ctypes.c_double * self.numNodes.value)()
5457        for i in range(self.numNodes.value):
5458            self.coordsX[i] = float(xCoords[i])
5459            self.coordsY[i] = float(yCoords[i])
5460            self.coordsZ[i] = float(zCoords[i])
5461        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_coord(
5462            self.fileId,
5463            ctypes.byref(self.coordsX),
5464            ctypes.byref(self.coordsY),
5465            ctypes.byref(self.coordsZ))
5466
5467    def __ex_get_partial_coord(self, startNodeId, numNodes):
5468        start_node_num = ctypes.c_longlong(startNodeId)
5469        num_nodes = ctypes.c_longlong(numNodes)
5470        coordsX = (ctypes.c_double * numNodes)()
5471        coordsY = (ctypes.c_double * numNodes)()
5472        coordsZ = (ctypes.c_double * numNodes)()
5473        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_partial_coord(
5474            self.fileId,
5475            start_node_num,
5476            num_nodes,
5477            ctypes.byref(coordsX),
5478            ctypes.byref(coordsY),
5479            ctypes.byref(coordsZ))
5480        return list(coordsX), list(coordsY), list(coordsZ)
5481
5482    def __ex_get_id_map(self, objType):
5483        inqType = ex_obj_to_inq(objType)
5484        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5485        inq_type = ctypes.c_int(ex_inquiry_map(inqType))
5486        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inq_type))
5487        numObjs = num_objs.value
5488        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5489            id_map = (ctypes.c_longlong * numObjs)()
5490        else:
5491            id_map = (ctypes.c_int * numObjs)()
5492        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_id_map(self.fileId, obj_type, ctypes.byref(id_map))
5493        idMap = [id_map[i] for i in range(numObjs)]
5494        if self.use_numpy:
5495            idMap = self.np.array(idMap)
5496        return idMap
5497
5498    def __ex_get_num_map(self, objType, idx):
5499        inqType = ex_obj_to_inq(objType)
5500        map_id = ctypes.c_longlong(idx)
5501        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5502        inq_type = ctypes.c_int(ex_inquiry_map(inqType))
5503        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inq_type))
5504        numObjs = num_objs.value
5505        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5506            id_map = (ctypes.c_longlong * numObjs)()
5507        else:
5508            id_map = (ctypes.c_int * numObjs)()
5509        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_num_map(self.fileId, obj_type, map_id, ctypes.byref(id_map))
5510        idMap = [id_map[i] for i in range(numObjs)]
5511        if self.use_numpy:
5512            idMap = self.np.array(idMap)
5513        return idMap
5514
5515    def __ex_put_map_param(self, nodeMapCnt, elemMapCnt):
5516        node_map_cnt = ctypes.c_int(nodeMapCnt)
5517        elem_map_cnt = ctypes.c_int(elemMapCnt)
5518        errorInt = EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_map_param(
5519            self.fileId, node_map_cnt, elem_map_cnt)
5520        if errorInt != 0:
5521            print(("ERROR code =", errorInt))
5522            raise Exception(
5523                "ERROR: ex_put_map_param had problems.")
5524        return True
5525
5526    def __ex_put_num_map(self, objType, idx, numMap):
5527        inqType = ex_obj_to_inq(objType)
5528        map_id = ctypes.c_longlong(idx)
5529        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5530        inq_type = ctypes.c_int(ex_inquiry_map(inqType))
5531        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inq_type))
5532        numObjs = num_objs.value
5533        assert numObjs == len(numMap)
5534        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5535            num_map = (ctypes.c_longlong * numObjs)()
5536            for i in range(numObjs):
5537                num_map[i] = ctypes.c_longlong(numMap[i])
5538        else:
5539            num_map = (ctypes.c_int * numObjs)()
5540            for i in range(numObjs):
5541                num_map[i] = ctypes.c_int(numMap[i])
5542        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_num_map(self.fileId, obj_type, map_id, ctypes.byref(num_map))
5543        return True
5544
5545    def __ex_get_block_id_map(self, obj_type, id):
5546        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(obj_type))
5547        entity_id = ctypes.c_longlong(id)
5548        _, numObjs, _, _ = self.__ex_get_block('EX_ELEM_BLOCK', id)
5549        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5550            id_map = (ctypes.c_longlong * numObjs)()
5551        else:
5552            id_map = (ctypes.c_int * numObjs)()
5553        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_block_id_map(self.fileId, obj_type, entity_id, id_map)
5554        if self.use_numpy:
5555            id_map = ctype_to_numpy(self, id_map)
5556            return id_map
5557        else:
5558            idMap = [id_map[i] for i in range(numObjs)]
5559            return idMap
5560
5561    def __ex_put_id_map(self, objType, idMap):
5562        inqType = ex_obj_to_inq(objType)
5563        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5564        inq_type = ctypes.c_int(ex_inquiry_map(inqType))
5565        num_objs = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(inq_type))
5566        numObjs = num_objs.value
5567        assert numObjs == len(idMap)
5568        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_IDS_INT64_API:
5569            id_map = (ctypes.c_longlong * numObjs)()
5570            for i in range(numObjs):
5571                id_map[i] = ctypes.c_longlong(idMap[i])
5572        else:
5573            id_map = (ctypes.c_int * numObjs)()
5574            for i in range(numObjs):
5575                id_map[i] = ctypes.c_int(idMap[i])
5576        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_id_map(self.fileId, obj_type, ctypes.byref(id_map))
5577        return True
5578
5579    def __ex_get_elem_num_map(self):
5580        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_MAPS_INT64_API:
5581            elemNumMap = (ctypes.c_longlong * self.numElem.value)()
5582        else:
5583            elemNumMap = (ctypes.c_int * self.numElem.value)()
5584        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_elem_num_map(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(elemNumMap))
5585        return elemNumMap
5586
5587    def __ex_get_node_num_map(self):
5588        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_MAPS_INT64_API:
5589            nodeNumMap = (ctypes.c_longlong * self.numNodes.value)()
5590        else:
5591            nodeNumMap = (ctypes.c_int * self.numNodes.value)()
5592        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_node_num_map(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(nodeNumMap))
5593        return nodeNumMap
5594
5595    def __ex_get_elem_order_map(self):
5596        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_MAPS_INT64_API:
5597            elemOrderMap = (ctypes.c_longlong * self.numElem.value)()
5598        else:
5599            elemOrderMap = (ctypes.c_int * self.numElem.value)()
5600        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_map(self.fileId, ctypes.byref(elemOrderMap))
5601        return elemOrderMap
5602
5603    def __ex_get_block(self, object_type, object_id):
5604        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(object_type))
5605        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5606        blk_type = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1)
5607        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5608            num_elem_this_blk = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5609            num_nodes_per_elem = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5610            num_edges_per_elem = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5611            num_faces_per_elem = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5612            num_attr = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5613        else:
5614            num_elem_this_blk = ctypes.c_int(0)
5615            num_nodes_per_elem = ctypes.c_int(0)
5616            num_edges_per_elem = ctypes.c_int(0)
5617            num_faces_per_elem = ctypes.c_int(0)
5618            num_attr = ctypes.c_int(0)
5619        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_block(
5620            self.fileId,
5621            obj_type,
5622            block_id,
5623            blk_type,
5624            ctypes.byref(num_elem_this_blk),
5625            ctypes.byref(num_nodes_per_elem),
5626            ctypes.byref(num_edges_per_elem),
5627            ctypes.byref(num_faces_per_elem),
5628            ctypes.byref(num_attr))
5629        return blk_type.value, int(num_elem_this_blk.value), int(num_nodes_per_elem.value), int(num_attr.value)
5630
5631    def __ex_put_block(
5632            self,
5633            object_type,
5634            object_id,
5635            eType,
5636            numElems,
5637            numNodesPerElem,
5638            numAttrsPerElem):
5639        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(object_type))
5640        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5641        if type(eType) == str:
5642            eType = eType.encode('ascii')
5643        elem_type = ctypes.create_string_buffer(eType.upper(), MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5644        num_elem_this_blk = ctypes.c_longlong(numElems)
5645        num_nodes_per_elem = ctypes.c_longlong(numNodesPerElem)
5646        num_edges_per_elem = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5647        num_faces_per_elem = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5648        num_attr = ctypes.c_longlong(numAttrsPerElem)
5649        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_block(self.fileId, obj_type, block_id, elem_type,
5650                                num_elem_this_blk, num_nodes_per_elem,
5651                                num_edges_per_elem, num_faces_per_elem, num_attr)
5652
5653    def __ex_get_elem_conn(self, object_id):
5654        (_elem_type, num_elem_this_blk, num_nodes_per_elem,
5655         _num_attr) = self.__ex_get_block('EX_ELEM_BLOCK', object_id)
5656        elem_block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5657        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5658            elem_block_connectivity = (
5659                ctypes.c_longlong * (num_elem_this_blk * num_nodes_per_elem))()
5660        else:
5661            elem_block_connectivity = (
5662                ctypes.c_int * (num_elem_this_blk * num_nodes_per_elem))()
5663        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_conn(
5664            self.fileId,
5665            ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK')),
5666            elem_block_id,
5667            ctypes.byref(elem_block_connectivity), None, None)
5668        return elem_block_connectivity, num_elem_this_blk, num_nodes_per_elem
5669
5670    def __ex_put_elem_conn(self, object_id, connectivity):
5671        (_elem_type, num_elem_this_blk, num_nodes_per_elem,
5672         _num_attr) = self.__ex_get_block('EX_ELEM_BLOCK', object_id)
5673        elem_block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5674        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5675            elem_block_connectivity = (
5676                ctypes.c_longlong * (num_elem_this_blk * num_nodes_per_elem))()
5677            for i in range(num_elem_this_blk * num_nodes_per_elem):
5678                elem_block_connectivity[i] = ctypes.c_longlong(connectivity[i])
5679        else:
5680            elem_block_connectivity = (
5681                ctypes.c_int * (num_elem_this_blk * num_nodes_per_elem))()
5682            for i in range(num_elem_this_blk * num_nodes_per_elem):
5683                elem_block_connectivity[i] = ctypes.c_int(connectivity[i])
5684        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_conn(
5685            self.fileId,
5686            ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK')),
5687            elem_block_id,
5688            elem_block_connectivity, None, None)
5689
5690    def __ex_put_one_attr(self, objType, elemBlkID, attrIndx, Attr):
5691        elem_blk_id = ctypes.c_longlong(elemBlkID)
5692        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5693        attr_index = ctypes.c_longlong(attrIndx)
5694        attrib = (ctypes.c_double * len(Attr))()
5695        for i, attr in enumerate(Attr):
5696            attrib[i] = float(attr)
5697        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_one_attr(
5698            self.fileId,
5699            obj_type,
5700            elem_blk_id,
5701            attr_index,
5702            attrib)
5703
5704    def __ex_get_one_attr(self, objType, entityId, attrIndx):
5705        entity_id = ctypes.c_longlong(entityId)
5706        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5707        attr_index = ctypes.c_longlong(attrIndx)
5708
5709        numVals = self.get_entity_count(objType, entityId)
5710        attrib = (ctypes.c_double * numVals)()
5711
5712        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_one_attr(
5713            self.fileId,
5714            obj_type,
5715            entity_id,
5716            attr_index,
5717            ctypes.byref(attrib))
5718        return attrib
5719
5720    def __ex_put_elem_attr(self, elemBlkID, Attr):
5721        elem_blk_id = ctypes.c_longlong(elemBlkID)
5722        attrib = (ctypes.c_double * len(Attr))()
5723        for i, attr in enumerate(Attr):
5724            attrib[i] = ctypes.c_double(attr)
5725        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_attr(
5726            self.fileId,
5727            ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK')),
5728            elem_blk_id,
5729            attrib)
5730
5731    def __ex_get_elem_attr(self, elemBlkID):
5732        elem_blk_id = ctypes.c_longlong(elemBlkID)
5733        numAttrThisBlk = self.num_attr(elemBlkID)
5734        numElemsThisBlk = self.get_entity_count('EX_ELEM_BLOCK', elemBlkID)
5735        totalAttr = numAttrThisBlk * numElemsThisBlk
5736        attrib = (ctypes.c_double * totalAttr)()
5737        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_attr(
5738            self.fileId,
5739            ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_ELEM_BLOCK')),
5740            elem_blk_id,
5741            ctypes.byref(attrib))
5742        return attrib
5743
5744    def __ex_get_variable_param(self, varType):
5745        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5746        num_vars = ctypes.c_int()
5747        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_variable_param(
5748            self.fileId, var_type, ctypes.byref(num_vars))
5749        return num_vars
5750
5751    def __ex_get_variable_names(self, varType):
5752        num_vars = self.__ex_get_variable_param(varType)
5753        var_name_ptrs = (
5754            ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)) * num_vars.value)()
5755
5756        for i in range(num_vars.value):
5757            var_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
5758                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5759                    MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1))
5760
5761        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5762        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_variable_names(
5763            self.fileId,
5764            var_type,
5765            num_vars,
5766            ctypes.byref(var_name_ptrs))
5767        return [vnp.contents.value.decode('utf8') for vnp in var_name_ptrs]
5768
5769    def __ex_get_var(self, timeStep, varType, varId, blkId, numValues):
5770        step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5771        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5772        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
5773        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(blkId)
5774        num_values = ctypes.c_longlong(numValues)
5775        var_vals = (ctypes.c_double * num_values.value)()
5776        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_var(
5777            self.fileId,
5778            step,
5779            var_type,
5780            var_id,
5781            block_id,
5782            num_values,
5783            var_vals)
5784        return var_vals
5785
5786    def __ex_get_partial_var(self, timeStep, varType, varId, blkId, startIndex, numValues):
5787        step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5788        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5789        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
5790        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(blkId)
5791        start_index = ctypes.c_longlong(startIndex)
5792        num_values = ctypes.c_longlong(numValues)
5793        var_vals = (ctypes.c_double * num_values.value)()
5794        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_partial_var(
5795            self.fileId,
5796            step,
5797            var_type,
5798            var_id,
5799            block_id,
5800            start_index,
5801            num_values,
5802            var_vals)
5803        return var_vals
5804
5805    def __ex_put_var(self, timeStep, varType, varId, blkId, numValues, values):
5806        step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5807        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5808        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
5809        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(blkId)
5810        num_values = ctypes.c_longlong(numValues)
5811        var_vals = (ctypes.c_double * num_values.value)()
5812        for i in range(num_values.value):
5813            var_vals[i] = float(values[i])
5814        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_var(
5815            self.fileId,
5816            step,
5817            var_type,
5818            var_id,
5819            block_id,
5820            num_values,
5821            var_vals)
5822        return True
5823
5824    def __ex_put_reduction_variable_param(self, varType, numVars):
5825        num_vars = ctypes.c_int(numVars)
5826        current_num = self.__ex_get_reduction_variable_param(varType)
5827        if current_num.value == num_vars.value:
5828            # print "value already set"
5829            return True
5830
5831        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5832        errorInt = EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_reduction_variable_param(
5833            self.fileId, var_type, num_vars)
5834        if errorInt != 0:
5835            print(("ERROR code =", errorInt))
5836            raise Exception(
5837                "ERROR: ex_put_reduction_variable_param had problems."
5838                " This can only be called once per varType.")
5839        return True
5840
5841    def __ex_get_reduction_variable_param(self, varType):
5842        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5843        num_vars = ctypes.c_int()
5844        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_reduction_variable_param(
5845            self.fileId, var_type, ctypes.byref(num_vars))
5846        return num_vars
5847
5848    def __ex_get_reduction_variable_name(self, varType, varId):
5849        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5850        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
5851        name = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5852        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_reduction_variable_name(self.fileId, var_type, var_id, name)
5853        return name.value.decode("utf8")
5854
5855    def __ex_put_reduction_variable_name(self, varType, varId, varName):
5856        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5857        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
5858        name = ctypes.create_string_buffer(varName.encode('ascii'), MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
5859        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_reduction_variable_name(self.fileId, var_type, var_id, name)
5860        return True
5861
5862    def __ex_get_reduction_variable_names(self, varType):
5863        num_vars = self.__ex_get_reduction_variable_param(varType)
5864        var_name_ptrs = (
5865            ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)) * num_vars.value)()
5866
5867        for i in range(num_vars.value):
5868            var_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
5869                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
5870                    MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1))
5871
5872        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5873        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_reduction_variable_names(
5874            self.fileId,
5875            var_type,
5876            num_vars,
5877            ctypes.byref(var_name_ptrs))
5878        return [vnp.contents.value.decode('utf8') for vnp in var_name_ptrs]
5879
5880    def __ex_get_reduction_vars(self, timeStep, varType, blkId, numValues):
5881        step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5882        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5883        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(blkId)
5884        num_values = ctypes.c_longlong(numValues)
5885        var_vals = (ctypes.c_double * num_values.value)()
5886        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_reduction_vars(
5887            self.fileId,
5888            step,
5889            var_type,
5890            block_id,
5891            num_values,
5892            var_vals)
5893        return var_vals
5894
5895    def __ex_put_reduction_vars(self, timeStep, varType, blkId, numValues, values):
5896        step = ctypes.c_int(timeStep)
5897        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
5898        block_id = ctypes.c_longlong(blkId)
5899        num_values = ctypes.c_longlong(numValues)
5900        var_vals = (ctypes.c_double * num_values.value)()
5901        for i in range(num_values.value):
5902            var_vals[i] = float(values[i])
5903        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_reduction_vars(
5904            self.fileId,
5905            step,
5906            var_type,
5907            block_id,
5908            num_values,
5909            var_vals)
5910        return True
5911
5912    def __ex_get_side_set_node_list_len(self, object_id):
5913        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5914        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5915            side_set_node_list_len = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5916        else:
5917            side_set_node_list_len = ctypes.c_int(0)
5918        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_side_set_node_list_len(
5919            self.fileId, side_set_id, ctypes.byref(side_set_node_list_len))
5920        return side_set_node_list_len
5921
5922    def __ex_get_set_param(self, objType, object_id):
5923        object_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5924        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5925        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5926            num_side_in_set = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5927            num_dist_fact_in_set = ctypes.c_longlong(0)
5928        else:
5929            num_side_in_set = ctypes.c_int(0)
5930            num_dist_fact_in_set = ctypes.c_int(0)
5931        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_set_param(
5932            self.fileId,
5933            object_type,
5934            side_set_id,
5935            ctypes.byref(num_side_in_set),
5936            ctypes.byref(num_dist_fact_in_set))
5937        return int(num_side_in_set.value), int(num_dist_fact_in_set.value)
5938
5939    def __ex_put_set_param(self, objType, object_id, numSides, numDistFacts):
5940        object_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
5941        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5942        num_side_in_set = ctypes.c_longlong(numSides)
5943        num_dist_fact_in_set = ctypes.c_longlong(numDistFacts)
5944        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_set_param(
5945            self.fileId,
5946            object_type,
5947            side_set_id,
5948            num_side_in_set,
5949            num_dist_fact_in_set)
5950        return True
5951
5952    def __ex_get_side_set(self, sideSetId):
5953        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(sideSetId)
5954        (num_side_in_set, _num_dist_fact_in_set) = self.__ex_get_set_param('EX_SIDE_SET', sideSetId)
5955        if num_side_in_set == 0:
5956            return [], []
5957        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5958            side_set_elem_list = (ctypes.c_longlong * num_side_in_set)()
5959            side_set_side_list = (ctypes.c_longlong * num_side_in_set)()
5960        else:
5961            side_set_elem_list = (ctypes.c_int * num_side_in_set)()
5962            side_set_side_list = (ctypes.c_int * num_side_in_set)()
5963        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_set(
5964            self.fileId,
5965            ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_SIDE_SET')),
5966            side_set_id,
5967            ctypes.byref(side_set_elem_list),
5968            ctypes.byref(side_set_side_list))
5969        return side_set_elem_list, side_set_side_list
5970
5971    def __ex_put_side_set(self, object_id, sideSetElements, sideSetSides):
5972        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
5973        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
5974            side_set_elem_list = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(sideSetElements))()
5975            side_set_side_list = (ctypes.c_longlong * len(sideSetSides))()
5976            for i, sse in enumerate(sideSetElements):
5977                side_set_elem_list[i] = ctypes.c_longlong(sse)
5978                side_set_side_list[i] = ctypes.c_longlong(sideSetSides[i])
5979        else:
5980            side_set_elem_list = (ctypes.c_int * len(sideSetElements))()
5981            side_set_side_list = (ctypes.c_int * len(sideSetSides))()
5982            for i, sse in enumerate(sideSetElements):
5983                side_set_elem_list[i] = ctypes.c_int(sse)
5984                side_set_side_list[i] = ctypes.c_int(sideSetSides[i])
5985        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_set(
5986            self.fileId,
5987            ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type('EX_SIDE_SET')),
5988            side_set_id,
5989            side_set_elem_list,
5990            side_set_side_list)
5991        return True
5992
5993    def __ex_get_side_set_dist_fact(self, sideSetId):
5994        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(sideSetId)
5995        side_set_node_list_len = self.__ex_get_side_set_node_list_len(
5996            sideSetId)
5997        set_dfs = (ctypes.c_double * side_set_node_list_len.value)()
5998        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_side_set_dist_fact(
5999            self.fileId, side_set_id, ctypes.byref(set_dfs))
6000        return set_dfs
6001
6002    def __ex_put_side_set_dist_fact(self, sideSetId, sideSetDistFact):
6003        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(sideSetId)
6004        side_set_dist_fact = (ctypes.c_double * len(sideSetDistFact))()
6005        for i, df in enumerate(sideSetDistFact):
6006            side_set_dist_fact[i] = ctypes.c_double(df)
6007        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_side_set_dist_fact(
6008            self.fileId, side_set_id, side_set_dist_fact)
6009
6010    def __ex_get_side_set_node_list(self, object_id):
6011        side_set_id = ctypes.c_longlong(object_id)
6012        side_set_node_list_len = self.__ex_get_side_set_node_list_len(object_id)
6013        (num_side_in_set, _num_dist_fact_in_set) = self.__ex_get_set_param('EX_SIDE_SET', object_id)
6014        if EXODUS_LIB.ex_int64_status(self.fileId) & EX_BULK_INT64_API:
6015            side_set_node_cnt_list = (ctypes.c_longlong * num_side_in_set)()
6016            side_set_node_list = (ctypes.c_longlong * side_set_node_list_len.value)()
6017        else:
6018            side_set_node_cnt_list = (ctypes.c_int * num_side_in_set)()
6019            side_set_node_list = (ctypes.c_int * side_set_node_list_len.value)()
6020        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_side_set_node_list(self.fileId, side_set_id,
6021                                             ctypes.byref(side_set_node_cnt_list),
6022                                             ctypes.byref(side_set_node_list))
6023        return side_set_node_cnt_list, side_set_node_list
6024
6025    def __ex_put_variable_param(self, varType, numVars):
6026        num_vars = ctypes.c_int(numVars)
6027        current_num = self.__ex_get_variable_param(varType)
6028        if current_num.value == num_vars.value:
6029            # print "value already set"
6030            return True
6031
6032        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
6033        errorInt = EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_variable_param(
6034            self.fileId, var_type, num_vars)
6035        if errorInt != 0:
6036            print(("ERROR code =", errorInt))
6037            raise Exception(
6038                "ERROR: ex_put_variable_param had problems."
6039                " This can only be called once per varType.")
6040        return True
6041
6042    def __ex_get_variable_name(self, varType, varId):
6043        var_type = ctypes.c_int(varType)
6044        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
6045        name = ctypes.create_string_buffer(MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
6046        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_variable_name(self.fileId, var_type, var_id, name)
6047        return name.decode('utf8')
6048
6049    def __ex_put_variable_name(self, varType, varId, varName):
6050        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
6051        var_id = ctypes.c_int(varId)
6052        name = ctypes.create_string_buffer(varName.encode('ascii'), MAX_NAME_LENGTH + 1)
6053        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_variable_name(self.fileId, var_type, var_id, name)
6054        return True
6055
6056    def __ex_get_attr_names(self, objType, blkId):
6057        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
6058        object_id = ctypes.c_longlong(blkId)
6059        num_attr = ctypes.c_int(self.num_attr(blkId))
6060        len_name = self.__ex_inquire_int(ex_inquiry_map('EX_INQ_MAX_READ_NAME_LENGTH'))
6061        attr_name_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (len_name + 1)) * num_attr.value)()
6062        for i in range(num_attr.value):
6063            attr_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(ctypes.create_string_buffer(len_name + 1))
6064        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_attr_names(
6065            self.fileId, obj_type, object_id, ctypes.byref(attr_name_ptrs))
6066        return [cnp.contents.value.decode('utf8') for cnp in attr_name_ptrs]
6067
6068    def __ex_put_attr_names(self, objType, blkId, varNames):
6069        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
6070        object_id = ctypes.c_int(blkId)
6071        num_attr = ctypes.c_int(self.num_attr(blkId))
6072        len_name = self.__ex_inquire_int(ex_inquiry_map('EX_INQ_MAX_READ_NAME_LENGTH'))
6073        attr_name_ptrs = (ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (len_name + 1)) * num_attr.value)()
6074        assert len(varNames) == num_attr.value
6075        for i in range(num_attr.value):
6076            attr_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
6077                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
6078                    varNames[i].encode('ascii'), len_name + 1))
6079        EXODUS_LIB.ex_put_attr_names(
6080            self.fileId, obj_type, object_id, ctypes.byref(attr_name_ptrs))
6081        return True
6082
6083    def __ex_get_prop_names(self, varType, inqType):
6084        var_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(varType))
6085        num_props = ctypes.c_int(self.__ex_inquire_int(ex_inquiry_map(inqType)))
6086        prop_name_ptrs = (
6087            ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_char * (MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1)) * num_props.value)()
6088        for i in range(num_props.value):
6089            prop_name_ptrs[i] = ctypes.pointer(
6090                ctypes.create_string_buffer(
6091                    MAX_STR_LENGTH + 1))
6092        EXODUS_LIB.ex_get_prop_names(
6093            self.fileId, var_type, ctypes.byref(prop_name_ptrs))
6094        return [cnp.contents.value.decode('utf8') for cnp in prop_name_ptrs]
6095
6096    def __ex_get_prop(self, objType, objId, propName):
6097        obj_type = ctypes.c_int(get_entity_type(objType))
